name: React Native 101 Workshop - Easy Mobile Development
body:
### React Native 101 Workshop
Everything you need to follow along is on the master branch of this repo. If you want to see the finished product it is on a branch labeled final.

### Prerequisites 
To make the workshop run smoothly please make sure you have the following things setup.
I'm only going to being running through running on iOS but all the code is agnostic to platform so you can run it on android if you so desire.

1. Xcode, you can download it from the Mac App Store
2. Nodejs, [Install Node](https://nodejs.org/dist/v4.4.2/node-v4.4.2.pkg)
3. Install Watchman through homebrew ($brew install watchman, If you don't have homebrew installed go to [brew.sh](http://brew.sh/) and follow directions
4. Install react-native through npm `npm i react-native-cli -g` If you get an error when installing run with sudo instead, `sudo npm i react-native-cli -g`
5. You are ready!

### Me
If you want to reach me and you have questions feel free to message me on twitter @Mmarzex or find me around the hackathon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
